verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> month, in the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> as I <S%H3427>sat<s%> in my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, that the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> on me.

Then I <S%H7200>beheld,<s%> and <S%H2009>see<s%> a <S%H1823>likeness<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire:<s%> from the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of his <S%H4975>loins<s%> even <S%H4295>downward,<s%> <S%H784>fire;<s%> and from his <S%H4975>loins<s%> even <S%H4605>upward,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H2096>brightness,<s%> as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H2830>amber.<s%>

And he <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> the <S%H8403>form<s%> of an <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> me by a <S%H6734>lock<s%> of my <S%H7218>head;<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> me up <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> me in the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6437>looks<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north;<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> was the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of the <S%H5566>image<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> which provokes to <S%H7069>jealousy.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H8033>there,<s%> according to the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in the <S%H1237>plain.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north.<s%> So I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5566>image<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> in the <S%H872>entry.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> furthermore to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> you <S%H4100>what<s%> they <S%H6213>do?<s%> even the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H6311>here,<s%> that I should <S%H7368>go<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> off from my <S%H4720>sanctuary?<s%> but <S%H7725>turn<s%> you <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> and you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>
And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H2691>court;<s%> and when I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H2356>hole<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2864>dig<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall:<s%> and when I had <S%H2864>dig<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H6607>door.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H935>Go<s%> in, and behold the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that they <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6311>here.<s%>

So I <S%H935>went<s%> in and <S%H7200>saw;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8403>form<s%> of <S%H7431>creeping<s%> things, and <S%H8263>abominable<s%> <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2707>portrayed<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And there <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H2204>ancients<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of them <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> with every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4730>censer<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and a <S%H6282>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H2204>ancients<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H2315>chambers<s%> of his <S%H4906>imagery?<s%> for they <S%H559>say,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> us not; the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> also to me, <S%H7725>Turn<s%> you <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> and you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that they <S%H6213>do.<s%>

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H1058>weeping<s%> for <S%H8542>Tammuz.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he to me, Have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> this, O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man?<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> you <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> and you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> than <S%H428>these.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> were about <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> with their <S%H268>backs<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> toward the <S%H6924>east;<s%> and they <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> toward the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, Have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> this, O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man?<s%> Is it a <S%H7043>light<s%> thing to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that they <S%H6213>commit<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H6311>here?<s%> for they have <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with <S%H2555>violence,<s%> and have <S%H7725>returned<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger:<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> they <S%H7971>put<s%> the <S%H2156>branch<s%> to their <S%H639>nose.<s%>

Therefore will I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> in <S%H2534>fury:<s%> my <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>spare,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I have <S%H2550>pity:<s%> and though they <S%H7121>cry<s%> in my <S%H241>ears<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> yet will I not <S%H8085>hear<s%> them.
